name: CitrusPeach Slimdown Packages
description:
We have bundle packages that are being put together for weight loss. If this intrigues any clients please feel free to call us at 4198552451. Prices vary and items in the package can be interchangeable. Mix corsets with any number of different products we offer and turn it into a package for extra savings. 

Weightloss shake packages include 

Any flavor shake, aloe and tea 
Any corset or vest, compression board, caffeine cream and black wrap

Larger sizes (XL and up) for corset or vest add a extra $ 8.00 
Start with your shake, aloe water and tea and watch the pounds melt away. Replace two meals with this process and instantly see a difference. 

 Formula 1 Nutritional Shake Mix

Overview

Treat your body to a healthy, balanced meal in no time! Not only are these shakes easy to make, they’re also delicious. With up to 20 essential vitamins, minerals and nutrients – and in seven flavors – weight management never tasted so good!
Key Benefits

    A healthy meal with up to 20 vitamins, minerals and essential nutrients.
    9g of protein and healthy fiber help support weight management.

Flavors Available 

French Vanilla  	
Dulce de Leche  	
Mint Chocolate  	
Vanilla - Allergen Free  	
Dutch Chocolate 	
Wild Berry  	
Cookies 'n Cream  	
Piña Colada  	
Cafe Latte  	
Kosher (Vanilla) 

 Personalized Protein Powder

Overview
Get more protein! Protein can help you feel fuller longer and assist you with your weight-management, fitness and health goals. Help satisfy pesky hunger pangs by adding this fat-free, protein-enriched powder to your shakes or meals.
Key Benefits

    Helps build and maintain lean muscle mass.
    Fat-free protein supplement for hunger control.
    Contains 5g of soy and whey protein, and all 9 essential amino acids.

 Herbal Tea Concentrate

Overview

Ditch the coffee and soda for this refreshing and tasty alternative. Feel reinvigorated with this natural energy lift, our answer to fatigue caused by stress.* It’s delicious, instant and low in calories.
Key Benefits

    Antioxidant and thermogenic benefits of green tea and botanical.*
    Provides an energy boost and weight-management support.*
    Delicious, instant and low-calorie.

Flavors 

Original 1.8oz 	
Lemon. 1.8oz 	
Raspberry 1.8oz 	
Peach 1.8oz

 Herbal Aloe Concentrate - Mango Flavor 
Overview

Supports healthy digestive function by soothing the stomach and alleviating occasional indigestion.
Key Benefits

    Relieves occasional indigestion*
    Improves nutrient absorption*
    Enhances intestinal health*
    Contains antioxidants

name: UNDERBUST STEEL BONE AGGRESSIVE CORSET for Waist Training
description:
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED 

This under bust corset is practical, functional and will complete any outfit. 24 spiral steel bones give ultimate shape and comfort around the hip. 5 layers of fabric make it one of the strongest and hardest wearing garments on the market. The corset is suitable for training of the waist but please seek medical advice before attempting this. Waist training corsets can be reduce your waist by 6"-7" but this is only for very experienced corset wearers. 
◾
24 Spiral Steel Bones

◾
Stainless Steel Busk Closure

◾
100% Fine cotton twill Lining

◾
Features Modesty Panel

◾
Strong Corset Cord Lacing

◾
No trim

◾
6 Suspender Loops

◾
Potential Waist Reduction 6-7"

◾Color: 
black

◾Length: 
10 1/2''

◾Fabric Description: 
Satin Polyester

◾Bust line: 
Under Bust

THESE CORSETS ARE FIT TO OREDER. NO SIZE CHART NEEDED. 

THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT VARIETIES AVAILABLE FOR THIS CORSET AS FAR AS COLOR, LENGTH, AND FABRIC. SOME ALTERATIONS AT NO ADDITIONAL CHARGE

name: WEIGHTLOSS LATEX COMPRESSION CORSET VEST
description:
If you’ve been looking for a maximum compression body shaping vest, you’re going to love the firm hold the Latex Vest . This underbust vest provides complete control from the abdomen to the midriff, handling love-handles and taming troubled tummies. The Vest will slim inches from your waist as soon as you put it on, while lifting the bust. This item also stands you up straight and slender, creating a longer, leaner look for your whole figure. Flexi Boning holds the garment in place, preventing rolling and ride up.

The Latex Vest reduce your waist immediately. The Vest’s compression boosts body heat, increasing perspiration and circulation. This breaks down fat and toxins, maximizing the work your muscles do. As your body slims, two columns of hook and eye closures allow the garment to slim down with you. Whether you wear it under skintight skirts or with your favorite skinny jeans, This Latex Vest is going to be one shaper you’ll hold near and dear.

-RESULTS 
Accelerated weight loss 
Instantly reduced inches around the midsection 
Reduced waistline and flattened abdomen 
Lifted and enhanced bust 
Corrected posture and reduced back pain

-FEATURES 
Firm compression vest 
Underbust design 
FlexiBoning prevents the garment from rolling up 
Double hook and eye closure 
High back 
Adjustable straps

Materials: Outer Lining - Latex 100% , Inner Lining - Cotton 100%



SIZE (Your t-shirt WITHOUT stretch) 
  

30-XS 
32-S 
34-M 
36-L 
38-XL 
40-2X 
42-3X 
44-4X 
46-5xL 


NOTE: Prices & Colors are subject to change without notice.

name: SPORT WAIST TRAINER
description:
Maximize your workout with a more active style waist training garment. Take it to the gym or for a run outside and let it add impact to your healthy lifestyle routine. Here’s how it works. You wrap the band around your midsection. This action creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells. Put simply, the band helps ensure that your workout is working for you.

The band itself is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdominals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment down with you. FelixBoning anchors the waist trainer and prevents migration. If you’ve been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle, you’ll love the Active Waist Trainer!

-RESULTS 
Midsection control 
Increased thermal activity 
Loss of inches reported 
Mobilizes fat cells 
Stimulates perspiration

-FEATURES 
Latex workout band 
Hook-and-eye closures 
FlexiBoning 
Cotton lining 
Materials: Linings: Cotton 96%, Spandex 4%, Core: Latex 100%

SIZE (Your t-shirt WITHOUT stretch) 

30-XS 
32-S 
34-M 
36-L 
38-XL 
40-2X
